About Me

Hi! My name is Randy Meneses and I am a web developer based in Orange County, CA. My path towards web development is long; I was a Music major in college but opted to get a degree in Business. Frustrated that I could not utlize my creative side, I sought for new career paths.

I discovered that web development resonates with both my creative and logical sides.

Here are some technologies I am confident in:

HTML5

CSS3

JavaScript & jQuery

BootStrap

Currently learning PHP
